IRS990.MissionDesc: THE NORTHERN DIVISION OF THE NATIONAL SKI PATROL IS A MEMBER-DRIVEN PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATION OF REGISTERED SKI PATROLS, PATROLLERS, AND OTHERS. THE NORTHERN DIVISION OF THE NSP SUPPORTS ITS MEMBERS THROUGH CREDENTIALED EDUCATION AND TRAINING IN LEADERSHIP, OUTDOOR EMERGENCY CARE, SAFETY, AND TRANSPORTATION SERVICES, WHICH ENABLES MEMBERS TO SERVE THE COMMUNITY IN THE SAFE ENJOYMENT OF OUTDOOR RECREATION.
IRS990.Desc: NATIONAL SKI PATROL IS A NO FEE SERVICE OFFERED TO INJUREDRECREATIONALISTS BOTH AT CONTROLLED AREAS AS WELL AS INTHE FIELD. THE MEMBERS AND THE PUBLIC BENEFIT FROM FIRSTAID CLASSES, MOUNTAINEER TRAINING CLASSES, AVALANCHE EDUCATION ANDRESCUE CLASSES OFFERED BY NATIONAL SKI PATROL. COORDINATION OF MEMBERAFFILIATES, DISTRIBUTION OF CURRENT INFORMATION, AND TESTING OF SKILLLEVELS ARE PART OF THE PROGRAM SERVICE ACCOMPLISHMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO LATER THAN JANUARY 1 OF EVERY ODD NUMBERED YEAR, THE DIVISION DIRECTOR SHALL APPOINT AN ELECTION COMMITTEE CONSISTING OF ONE OR MORE PATROLLERS WHO WILL RECEIVE NOMINATIONS AND PRONOUNCEMENTS OF CANDIDACY FOR THE OFFICES OF DIVISION DIRECTOR AND/OR REGION DIRECTOR DEPENDING ON WHICH OFFICER TERMS ARE SCHEDULED TO EXPIRE. THE ELECTION COMMITTEE SHALL SOLICIT AND RECEIVE NOMINATIONS OF INTERESTED AND QUALIFIED PERSONS, WHO SHALL SUBMIT THEIR LETTERS OF CANDIDACY AND A RESUME OF SKI PATROL EXPERIENCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE 990 IS MAILED OUT TO THE GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT IS APPROVED AND FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORMS 1023 AND 990 ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BYLAWS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.
